paragraf1: Fill out the application form. (booking without PREPAYMENT!) Our operator will contact you within an hour.
paragraf2: Attention!!! On the specified date and time, wait for the transfer near the entrance to the hotel, and not at the hotel reception.
paragraf3: Payment is made to the performer on the day of the excursion.
paragraf4: You can pay at Sberbank on Kaspi in USDT.
